definitions.definition: a period of twelve months, especially from 1 January to 31 December:
examples: Annette worked in Italy for two years.

definitions.definition: a period of twelve months relating to a particular activity:
examples: The financial/tax year begins in April.

definitions.definition: the part of the year, in a school or university, during which courses are taught:
a group of students who start school, college, university, or a course together:
examples: Kathy was in the year above me at college.

definitions.definition: used to refer to a student in a particular year group at a school, college, or university:
examples: I like teaching the first-years, but the second-years can be difficult.
